content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed begins with Night Beat, and their story from August 21, 1950, The Doctor’s Secret.

(29:38) Our second story comes from WHItehall-1212. We’ll hear The Case Of Donald Simms, from January 20, 1952.

Download CaseClosed730

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
